title: West Virginia - poverty rate from 2000 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Percentage of population. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
Overall Percentage of population has decreased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2000 and 2001.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 19.1 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Percentage of population, of value 16.9 was reported at Year 2007
